channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2254|2024-08-04T07:01:41.187Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.23.2 and earlier provides an undocumented feature flag that, when enabled, allows an attacker with Job/Configure or Job/Create permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2255|2024-08-04T07:01:41.230Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.23.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL.
